original: yod pa ste spyi chen po dang / nyi tshe'i spyi'o //
analyzed: yod pa ste spyi chen po dang / nyi tshe'i spyi'o //
translated: Existence is of two kinds: general and particular.

original: bye brag gang zhe na /
analyzed: bye brag gang zhe na /
translated: What is particular?

original: de las bye brag tu dbye ba'o //
analyzed: de las bye brag tu dbye ba'o //
translated: It is the differentiation of that.

original: 'du ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'du ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is collection?

original: 'di dang 'dir 'du ba'o //üîΩde ltar bye brag pa'i tshig gi don drug po de dag las /
analyzed: 'di dang 'dir 'du ba'o // de ltar bye brag pa'i tshig gi don drug po de dag las /
translated: It is the collection of this and that.

original: yon tan nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i nang nas /
analyzed: yon tan nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i nang nas /
translated: Thus, among the twenty-four qualities of the Vai≈õe·π£ikas,

original: gzhan zhes bya ba de dang ldan na ni rdul phra rab de dag kyang gzhan zhes brjod pa yin la /
analyzed: gzhan zhes bya ba de dang ldan na ni rdul phra rab de dag kyang gzhan zhes brjod pa yin la /
translated: if something possesses the quality of ‚Äúotherness,‚Äù then those particles are said to be ‚Äúother.‚Äù

original: gzhan de dang mi ldan na ni rdul phra rab de dag kyang gzhan ma yin pa zhes brjod pa yin pas /
analyzed: gzhan de dang mi ldan na ni rdul phra rab de dag kyang gzhan ma yin pa zhes brjod pa yin pas /
translated: If they do not possess that otherness, then those particles are said to be ‚Äúnonother.‚Äù

original: 'dir dbu ma pa khyod kyi gtan tshigs gzhan yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba de yang bye brag pa'i tshig gi don drug po de dag las yon tan nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i nang nas gzhan zhes bya ba de dang ldan pas nang gi skye mched rnams de dag
analyzed: 'dir dbu ma pa khyod kyi gtan tshigs gzhan yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba de yang bye brag pa'i tshig gi don drug po de dag las yon tan nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i nang nas gzhan zhes bya ba de dang ldan pas nang gi skye mched rnams de dag
translated: Therefore, here, you MƒÅdhyamikas say, ‚ÄúThe reason is other,‚Äù but that is not established for us.

original: gi rkyen gzhan dag las skye ba med pa dang / gzhan brjod par 'dod pa mig la sogs pa'i nang gi skye mched 'grub par byed pa dag rkyen ma yin par nges te zhes bya bar rtog gam zhes zer ro //üîΩrang la @95a * //üîΩma grub pa'i don nyid do zhes bya ba ni de ltar khyod kyi gtan tshigs kyi don gzhan yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba de kho bo cag gi grub pa'i mtha' las byung ba'i tshig gi don drug po de dag las yon tan nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i nang
analyzed: gi rkyen gzhan dag las skye ba med pa dang / gzhan brjod par 'dod pa mig la sogs pa'i nang gi skye mched 'grub par byed pa dag rkyen ma yin par nges te zhes bya bar rtog gam zhes zer ro // rang la @95a * // ma grub pa'i don nyid do zhes bya ba ni de ltar khyod kyi gtan tshigs kyi don gzhan yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba de kho bo cag gi grub pa'i mtha' las byung ba'i tshig gi don drug po de dag las yon tan nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i nang
translated: and that the other conditions are not the conditions of the internal sense bases such as the eyes, which are the other things that you wish to describe?üîΩThe meaning of ‚Äúnot established for you‚Äù is that, since your reason is a different object, it is not established for you.

original: nas gzhan zhes bya ba de dang ldan pas khyod nang gi skye mched rnams de dag gi rkyen gzhan dag las skye ba med pa dang / gzhan brjod par 'dod pa mig la sogs pa nang gi skye mched 'grub par byed pa dag rkyen ma yin par nges par rtog na /
analyzed: nas gzhan zhes bya ba de dang ldan pas khyod nang gi skye mched rnams de dag gi rkyen gzhan dag las skye ba med pa dang / gzhan brjod par 'dod pa mig la sogs pa nang gi skye mched 'grub par byed pa dag rkyen ma yin par nges par rtog na /
translated: The meaning of the statement ‚ÄúYou are imagining that the other conditions are not the conditions of the internal sense bases such as the eyes, which are the other things that you wish to describe‚Äù is that you are imagining that the other conditions are not the conditions of the internal sense bases such as the eyes, which are the other things that you wish to describe.

original: de lta na nged kyi grub pa'i mtha' las 'byung ba'i gzhan des khyod rang la ma grub pa'i don nyid yin pas /
analyzed: de lta na nged kyi grub pa'i mtha' las 'byung ba'i gzhan des khyod rang la ma grub pa'i don nyid yin pas /
translated: In that case, the meaning of the other that occurs in our philosophical tenet is not established for you.

original: de'i phyir khyod kyi gtan tshigs de gang yang rung ba la ma grub pa nyid yin pas mi rung ngo //
analyzed: de'i phyir khyod kyi gtan tshigs de gang yang rung ba la ma grub pa nyid yin pas mi rung ngo //
translated: Therefore, your reason is not suitable because it is not established for either party.

original: de las gzhan pa'i don yin par rtog na ni zhes bya ba ni /üîΩ'on te dbu ma pa'i gtan tshigs kyi don gzhan yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba de dag bye brag pa'i grub pa'i mtha' las tshig gi don drug 'byung ba'i nang nas yon tan zhes bya ba de las gzhan pa'i don yin par rtog na ni 'jig rten la
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i don yin par rtog na ni zhes bya ba ni / 'on te dbu ma pa'i gtan tshigs kyi don gzhan yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba de dag bye brag pa'i grub pa'i mtha' las tshig gi don drug 'byung ba'i nang nas yon tan zhes bya ba de las gzhan pa'i don yin par rtog na ni 'jig rten la
translated: If you imagine that the meaning of the other is different from that,

original: grags pa dang 'gal ba'i gnod par 'gyur bas mi rung ngo zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: grags pa dang 'gal ba'i gnod par 'gyur bas mi rung ngo zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: if you imagine that the meaning of the other of the Madhyamaka reason is different from that, then, from among the six meanings of words that occur in the Vai≈õe·π£ika philosophical tenet, if you imagine that the meaning of the other is the meaning called quality, then it would be unsuitable because it would be undermined by contradicting what is renowned in the world.

original: de la bye brag pa'i grub pa'i mtha' las gzhan pa'i don yin par rtog na ni 'bras bu nang gi skye mched rnams kyi rkyen gzhan mer mer po dang nur nur po la sogs pa dang / 'bras bu myu gu la sogs pa phyi rol gyi skye mched rnams kyi rkyen gzhan sa bon la sogs pa de dag gzhan yin pa'i phyir 'bras bu yang de dag gi rkyen gzhan dag las skye ba med pa dang /
analyzed: de la bye brag pa'i grub pa'i mtha' las gzhan pa'i don yin par rtog na ni 'bras bu nang gi skye mched rnams kyi rkyen gzhan mer mer po dang nur nur po la sogs pa dang / 'bras bu myu gu la sogs pa phyi rol gyi skye mched rnams kyi rkyen gzhan sa bon la sogs pa de dag gzhan yin pa'i phyir 'bras bu yang de dag gi rkyen gzhan dag las skye ba med pa dang /
translated: If you imagine that the meaning of ‚Äúother‚Äù in the Vai≈õe·π£ika tenets is something different, then the conditions of the internal sense bases that are effects would not arise from those other conditions, because the conditions of the internal sense bases that are effects are different from the other conditions, such as the oval form and the oblong form, and the conditions of the external sense bases that are effects, such as sprouts, are different from the other conditions, such as seeds.

original: rkyen gzhan dag kyang rkyen ma yin par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: rkyen gzhan dag kyang rkyen ma yin par rtog pa'o //
translated: You would imagine that the other conditions are not conditions.

original: grags pa'i gnod par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni de ltar khyod kyi gtan tshigs kyi don gzhan yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba de /
analyzed: grags pa'i gnod par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni de ltar khyod kyi gtan tshigs kyi don gzhan yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba de /
translated: The consequence of being renowned would be unacceptable is as follows: In that case, your reason, ‚Äúbecause the meaning of other exists,‚Äù

original: 'bras bu rnams rkyen las gzhan yin pa'i phyir de dag gi rkyen gzhan dag las skye ba med pa dang / rkyen rnams kyang 'bras bu las gzhan yin pa'i phyir rkyen ma yin par rtog na /
analyzed: 'bras bu rnams rkyen las gzhan yin pa'i phyir de dag gi rkyen gzhan dag las skye ba med pa dang / rkyen rnams kyang 'bras bu las gzhan yin pa'i phyir rkyen ma yin par rtog na /
translated: Because effects are different from conditions, they do not arise from other conditions, and because conditions are different from effects, they are not conditions.

original: de lta na 'jig rten na ba lang rdzi'i chung ma yan chad la yang 'bras bu rnams de dag gi rkyen gzhan dag las skye ba dang / rkyen gzhan dag 'bras bu'i rkyen gzhan yin par grags pa dang 'gal ba'i gnod par 'gyur @95b bas de'i phyir /
analyzed: de lta na 'jig rten na ba lang rdzi'i chung ma yan chad la yang 'bras bu rnams de dag gi rkyen gzhan dag las skye ba dang / rkyen gzhan dag 'bras bu'i rkyen gzhan yin par grags pa dang 'gal ba'i gnod par 'gyur @95b bas de'i phyir /
translated: If you think in that way, then it would contradict the world‚Äôs renown that effects arise from other conditions and that other conditions are the conditions of effects, even for the wife of a cowherd.

original: khyod kyi gtan tshigs de la 'jig rten la grags pa dang 'gal ba'i gnod pa yod pas mi rung ngo zhe'o zhes bya ba ni bye brag pa dag las gzhan rdul phra rab dag kho na las /
analyzed: khyod kyi gtan tshigs de la 'jig rten la grags pa dang 'gal ba'i gnod pa yod pas mi rung ngo zhe'o zhes bya ba ni bye brag pa dag las gzhan rdul phra rab dag kho na las /
translated: Therefore, because your reason is undermined by contradicting what is renowned in the world, it is not suitable.üîΩThis is the refutation of the Vai≈õe·π£ikas‚Äô assertion that effects arise from subtle particles alone.

original: rdul phra mo gnyis la sogs pa'i rim gyis sa dang chu dang me dang rlung gi rnam grangs cha shas can gyi rdzas skye ba 'grub pa mngon par 'dod pa dag de skad ces zer zhing /
analyzed: rdul phra mo gnyis la sogs pa'i rim gyis sa dang chu dang me dang rlung gi rnam grangs cha shas can gyi rdzas skye ba 'grub pa mngon par 'dod pa dag de skad ces zer zhing /
translated: and so on, up to the elements of earth, water, fire, and wind, which are substances that have parts, are produced, and are accepted as existing.

original: dbu ma pa la phyir rgol ba nyid du gnas pa zlog par byed na'o //
analyzed: dbu ma pa la phyir rgol ba nyid du gnas pa zlog par byed na'o //
translated: But when they are refuted, they remain as opponents of the Madhyamikas.

original: de skad ces zer ba de'i lan du 'dir 'grel pa byed pas /
analyzed: de skad ces zer ba de'i lan du 'dir 'grel pa byed pas /
translated: In response to this, the author of the commentary says:

original: de ni bzang po ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni bzang po ma yin te /
translated: This is not good.

original: gzhan gyi blo'i rgyu spyi'i chos grub pa kho na ste /
analyzed: gzhan gyi blo'i rgyu spyi'i chos grub pa kho na ste /
translated: The cause of the other‚Äôs mind is the established universal property.

original: gtan tshigs nyid spyir brjod pa'i phyir dang / de yon tan nyid dam gzhan nyid yin par sems pa yang gzhan yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs nyid spyir brjod pa'i phyir dang / de yon tan nyid dam gzhan nyid yin par sems pa yang gzhan yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the reason itself is stated in general terms and because the thought that it is a quality or something else is different.

original: grags pa'i gnod par yang mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: grags pa'i gnod par yang mi 'gyur te /
translated: Nor is there the fault of contradicting what is commonly accepted.

original: dam bcas pa khyad par can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dam bcas pa khyad par can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the thesis is qualified.

original: don dam par sa'i rdul phra rab dag sa zhes bya ba'i rdzas rtsom par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: don dam par sa'i rdul phra rab dag sa zhes bya ba'i rdzas rtsom par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: Ultimately, the subtle particles of earth do not compose the substance called ‚Äúearth,‚Äù

original: rdul phra rab yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rdul phra rab yin pa'i phyir /
translated: because they are subtle particles.

original: dper na me'i rdul phra rab dag bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na me'i rdul phra rab dag bzhin no //
translated: For example, like the subtle particles of fire.

original: de bzhin du me'i rdul phra rab dag kyang me'i rdzas rtsom par byed pa ma yin te zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: de bzhin du me'i rdul phra rab dag kyang me'i rdzas rtsom par byed pa ma yin te zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: In the same way, the subtle particles of fire do not form the substance of fire, and so on.

original: 'dir ni sngar bye brag pa dag na re /
analyzed: 'dir ni sngar bye brag pa dag na re /
translated: Here, the Vai≈õe·π£ika says:

original: dbu ma pa'i gtan tshigs kyi don gzhan yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba de yon tan yin par rtog na ni rang la ma grub pa'i don nyid do //
analyzed: dbu ma pa'i gtan tshigs kyi don gzhan yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba de yon tan yin par rtog na ni rang la ma grub pa'i don nyid do //
translated: If you think that the meaning of the reason ‚Äúbecause it has a different meaning‚Äù is a quality, then it is a meaning that is not established for you.üîΩIf you think it is a meaning other than that, then there is the fault of what is renowned.

original: de las gzhan pa'i don yin par rtog na ni grags pa'i gnod par 'gyur ro zhes zer ba de bzang po ma yin te /
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i don yin par rtog na ni grags pa'i gnod par 'gyur ro zhes zer ba de bzang po ma yin te /
translated: That is not good.

original: sun 'byin pa ltar snang ba yin no zhes ston to //
analyzed: sun 'byin pa ltar snang ba yin no zhes ston to //
translated: It is taught that it is a semblance of a refutation.

original: de la de ni bzang po ma yin te zhes bya ba ni bye brag pa ji skad smras pa de ni sun 'byin pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de la de ni bzang po ma yin te zhes bya ba ni bye brag pa ji skad smras pa de ni sun 'byin pa ma yin te /
translated: Here, that is not good means that what the Vai≈õe·π£ika says is not a refutation.

original: sun 'byin pa ltar snang ba yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: sun 'byin pa ltar snang ba yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is a semblance of a refutation. That is the meaning.

original: sun 'byin pa ltar snang ba nyid yin par bstan pa'i phyir gzhan gyi blo'i rgyu spyi'i chos grub pa kho na ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras so //
analyzed: sun 'byin pa ltar snang ba nyid yin par bstan pa'i phyir gzhan gyi blo'i rgyu spyi'i chos grub pa kho na ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras so //
translated: In order to demonstrate that this is a mere semblance of refutation, the root text states, ‚ÄúThe mere general property that is the cause of the cognition of otherness . . .‚Äù

original: de la gzhan gyi blo'i rgyu zhes bya ba ni gzhan nyid yin par shes pa'i blo skye ba'i rgyu dang rgyu mtshan dang byed rgyu ni gzhan gyi blo'i rgyu ste /
analyzed: de la gzhan gyi blo'i rgyu zhes bya ba ni gzhan nyid yin par shes pa'i blo skye ba'i rgyu dang rgyu mtshan dang byed rgyu ni gzhan gyi blo'i rgyu ste /
translated: The cause of the cognition of otherness is the cause, reason, and instrument for the arising of the cognition that recognizes otherness.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: This is as follows.

original: skye mched rnams dang de dag gi rkyen rnams so //
analyzed: skye mched rnams dang de dag gi rkyen rnams so //
translated: The sense faculties and their conditions.

original: de dag gi spyi zhes bya ba ni chos te /üîΩgzhan gyi blo'i rgyu skye @96a * //
analyzed: de dag gi spyi zhes bya ba ni chos te / gzhan gyi blo'i rgyu skye @96a * //
translated: The general property of those is a property of universals.

original: mched rnams dang de dag gi rkyen rnams kyi spyi'o //
analyzed: mched rnams dang de dag gi rkyen rnams kyi spyi'o //
translated: The mere general property that is the cause of the cognition of otherness is the general property of the sense faculties and their conditions.

original: spyi de'i chos zhes bya ba ni spyi'i tshogs de'i chos gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: spyi de'i chos zhes bya ba ni spyi'i tshogs de'i chos gang yin pa ste /
translated: The property of that general property is a property of the collection of universals.

original: 'di lta ste /üîΩskye mched rnams las kyang rkyen rnams gzhan nyid yin la /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / skye mched rnams las kyang rkyen rnams gzhan nyid yin la /
translated: This is as follows.üîΩThe conditions are other than the sense faculties,

original: rkyen rnams las kyang skye mched rnams gzhan nyid yin pa'o //
analyzed: rkyen rnams las kyang skye mched rnams gzhan nyid yin pa'o //
translated: and the sense faculties are other than the conditions.

original: spyi de'i chos grub pa kho na ste zhes bya ba ni skye mched de yang rkyen de dag gi gzhan nyid kho na yin la /
analyzed: spyi de'i chos grub pa kho na ste zhes bya ba ni skye mched de yang rkyen de dag gi gzhan nyid kho na yin la /
translated: The property of the universal is established just in that,üîΩbecause that sense-sphere is just other than those conditions,

original: rkyen de dag kyang skye mched de'i gzhan nyid kho na yin pas de'i phyir spyi de'i chos grub pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: rkyen de dag kyang skye mched de'i gzhan nyid kho na yin pas de'i phyir spyi de'i chos grub pa kho na yin no //
translated: and those conditions are just other than that sense-sphere. Therefore, the property of the universal is established just in that.

original: gzhan gyi blo'i rgyu spyi'i chos grub pa kho na ste zhes bya ba 'di ni phyogs yin no //
analyzed: gzhan gyi blo'i rgyu spyi'i chos grub pa kho na ste zhes bya ba 'di ni phyogs yin no //
translated: This is the position: the property of the universal is established just as the cause of the cognition of other.

original: ji ltar na gzhan gyi blo'i rgyu spyi'i chos de grub pa kho na yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar na gzhan gyi blo'i rgyu spyi'i chos de grub pa kho na yin zhe na /
translated: How is the property of the universal established just as the cause of the cognition of other?

original: de'i phyir gtan tshigs nyid spyir brjod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: de'i phyir gtan tshigs nyid spyir brjod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: Therefore, he says, ‚Äúbecause the reason itself is stated as a universal.‚Äù

original: 'di ni phyogs kyi chos yin no //üîΩde la gtan tshigs nyid ces bya ba ni dbu ma pa'i gtan tshigs gzhan yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni phyogs kyi chos yin no // de la gtan tshigs nyid ces bya ba ni dbu ma pa'i gtan tshigs gzhan yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is the property of the position.üîΩThere, the reason itself is the reason of the Madhyamikas.

original: spyir brjod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni bye brag pa'i grub pa'i mtha' las 'byung ba'i yon tan yin no zhe'am /
analyzed: spyir brjod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni bye brag pa'i grub pa'i mtha' las 'byung ba'i yon tan yin no zhe'am /
translated: Because of the statement, ‚Äújust as the cause of the cognition of other,‚Äù the property of the universal is established just in that.

original: de las gzhan pa'i don yin no zhes bya bar bye brag tu khas ma blangs par bdag nyid ces bya ba spyi thun mong gang yin pa de gtan tshigs nyid du brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i don yin no zhes bya bar bye brag tu khas ma blangs par bdag nyid ces bya ba spyi thun mong gang yin pa de gtan tshigs nyid du brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: But since the meaning of ‚Äúother‚Äù is not accepted as being anything other than that, the general term ‚Äúitself‚Äù is stated as the reason.

original: gzhan gyi blo'i rgyu spyi'i chos grub pa kho na yin pas gzhan nyid ces bya ba'i don dbu ma pa rang la ma grub pa'i don nyid ma yin pas /
analyzed: gzhan gyi blo'i rgyu spyi'i chos grub pa kho na yin pas gzhan nyid ces bya ba'i don dbu ma pa rang la ma grub pa'i don nyid ma yin pas /
translated: Since the meaning of ‚Äúother‚Äù is established as a general phenomenon that is the cause of the cognition of others, the meaning of ‚Äúother‚Äù is not something that is not established for the Madhyamika himself.

original: khyed bye brag pa na re /
analyzed: khyed bye brag pa na re /
translated: The Vaise~ika says:üîΩIf the meaning of the reason is a quality, then it is not established for you.

original: gtan tshigs kyi don yon tan yin par rtog na ni rang la ma grub pa'i don nyid do zhes zer ba de ni sun 'byin pa ltar snang ba yin no zhes bya bar gnas so //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi don yon tan yin par rtog na ni rang la ma grub pa'i don nyid do zhes zer ba de ni sun 'byin pa ltar snang ba yin no zhes bya bar gnas so //
translated: This is a mere refutation.

original: de yon tan nyid dam gzhan nyid yin par sems pa yang sems pa gzhan yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni sngar bye brag pa khyed na re /
analyzed: de yon tan nyid dam gzhan nyid yin par sems pa yang sems pa gzhan yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni sngar bye brag pa khyed na re /
translated: The thought that it is a quality or that it is other is a different thought.üîΩThe Vaise~ika says:

original: gzhan yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs kyi don te /
analyzed: gzhan yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs kyi don te /
translated: The meaning of the reason is ‚Äúother.‚Äù

original: bye brag pa'i grub pa'i mtha' las 'byung ba'i yon tan yin par rtog gam /
analyzed: bye brag pa'i grub pa'i mtha' las 'byung ba'i yon tan yin par rtog gam /
translated: Do you think that it is a quality that arises from the Vai≈õe·π£ika tenets?üîΩOr do you think that it is an object that is different from that?

original: de las gzhan pa'i don yin par rtog ces khyed de ltar sems pa de ni bsam pa gzhan yin pa'i phyir gnas skabs 'dir dngos po rnams gzhan las skye ba med pa'i gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid bsam pa 'di la mi dgos so zhes bya ba'i tha tshigüîΩgo // grags pa'i gnod par mi 'gyur te //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i don yin par rtog ces khyed de ltar sems pa de ni bsam pa gzhan yin pa'i phyir gnas skabs 'dir dngos po rnams gzhan las skye ba med pa'i gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid bsam pa 'di la mi dgos so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // grags pa'i gnod par mi 'gyur te //
translated: Since you think in this way, you have another thought, and therefore, in this context, you do not need to think about the definition of the reason that things do not arise from other.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: There is no fault of contradicting what is commonly acknowledged.üîΩPreviously, the Vai≈õe·π£ikas said, ‚ÄúIf the meaning of the reason ‚Äòbecause they are different‚Äô is thought to be an object that is different from a quality, there is the fault of contradicting what is commonly acknowledged.‚Äù

original: @96b sngar bye brag pa dag na re gzhan yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs kyi don yon tan las gzhan pa'i don yin par rtog na ni grags pa'i gnod par 'gyur ro zhes zer ba de grags pa'i gnod par yang mi 'gyur te zhes dam 'cha'
analyzed: @96b sngar bye brag pa dag na re gzhan yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs kyi don yon tan las gzhan pa'i don yin par rtog na ni grags pa'i gnod par 'gyur ro zhes zer ba de grags pa'i gnod par yang mi 'gyur te zhes dam 'cha'
translated: We respond: There is no fault of contradicting what is commonly acknowledged.

original: zhing de sun 'byin ba ltar snang ba yin no zhes bsgrub pa ste /
analyzed: zhing de sun 'byin ba ltar snang ba yin no zhes bsgrub pa ste /
translated: This is the proof that your refutation is fallacious.

original: de yang phyogs yin no //
analyzed: de yang phyogs yin no //
translated: This is also the position.

original: ji ltar na grags pa'i gnod par yang mi 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar na grags pa'i gnod par yang mi 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How could it not be undermined by what is renowned?

original: de'i phyir dam bcas pa khyad par can yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: de'i phyir dam bcas pa khyad par can yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: Therefore, he says, ‚Äúbecause the thesis is distinctive.‚Äù

original: 'di ni phyogs kyi chos yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni phyogs kyi chos yin no //
translated: This is the property of the position.

original: de la dam bcas pa khyad par can yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir don dam par skye mched rnams gzhan las skye ba med do zhes smras pa gang yin pa des kun rdzob tu yang skye mched rnams gzhan las skye ba med do zhes
analyzed: de la dam bcas pa khyad par can yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir don dam par skye mched rnams gzhan las skye ba med do zhes smras pa gang yin pa des kun rdzob tu yang skye mched rnams gzhan las skye ba med do zhes
translated: With respect to that, because the thesis is distinctive means that because it is said that ultimately the sense spheres do not arise from other, that which does not reverse the statement that conventionally the sense spheres do not arise from other

original: zlog par mi byed pa de'i phyir grags pa'i gnod par 'gyur ba'i skabs med do //
analyzed: zlog par mi byed pa de'i phyir grags pa'i gnod par 'gyur ba'i skabs med do //
translated: is not undermined by what is renowned.

original: da ni sngar gzhan dag 'di snyam du phyi rol gyi dngos po rnams kyi skye bam bkag pa des na nang gi dngos po rnams kyi skye ba yang gnod ba med do snyam du sems pa gang yin pa de dag gi phyir /
analyzed: da ni sngar gzhan dag 'di snyam du phyi rol gyi dngos po rnams kyi skye bam bkag pa des na nang gi dngos po rnams kyi skye ba yang gnod ba med do snyam du sems pa gang yin pa de dag gi phyir /
translated: Now, previously others thought, ‚ÄúSince the arising of external things is refuted, the arising of internal things is also not undermined.‚Äù In order to refute that, he says,

original: bye brag pa dag las gzhan rdul phra rab dag kho na las rdul phra mo gnyis la sogs pa'i rim gyis /
analyzed: bye brag pa dag las gzhan rdul phra rab dag kho na las rdul phra mo gnyis la sogs pa'i rim gyis /
translated: Vaibhasikas assert that the elements are the basis of all form.üîΩ

original: sa dang chu dang me dang rlung gi rnam grangs cha shas can gyi rdzas skye ba 'grub par mngon par 'dod pa ji skad smos pa dag dgag par bya ste /
analyzed: sa dang chu dang me dang rlung gi rnam grangs cha shas can gyi rdzas skye ba 'grub par mngon par 'dod pa ji skad smos pa dag dgag par bya ste /
translated: The Vai≈õe·π£ikas assert that the subtle particles themselves, other than the elements, gradually form the substances with parts, such as the earth, water, fire, and wind elements, beginning with two subtle particles.üîΩThis will be refuted as stated.

original: de'i phyir don dam par sa'i rdul phra rab dag sa zhes bya ba'i rdzas rtsom par byed pa ma yin te rdul phra rab yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i phyir don dam par sa'i rdul phra rab dag sa zhes bya ba'i rdzas rtsom par byed pa ma yin te rdul phra rab yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore ultimately the subtle particles of earth do not compose the substance called earth because they are subtle particles.

original: dper na me'i rdul phra rab dag bzhin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras so //üîΩdon dam par zhes bya ba ni sngar gzhan ma yin pa ni 'dir thams cad don dam par bkag ste /
analyzed: dper na me'i rdul phra rab dag bzhin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras so // don dam par zhes bya ba ni sngar gzhan ma yin pa ni 'dir thams cad don dam par bkag ste /
translated: For example, like the subtle particles of fire.

original: nges par gzung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nges par gzung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Ultimately means that here everything is refuted ultimately because it is specified.

original: gzhan du yang mi 'gal te /
analyzed: gzhan du yang mi 'gal te /
translated: It is not contradictory elsewhere.

original: khyad par gyi gzhi'i khyad par ji skad bstan pa la 'gal ba med pa'i phyir dang / mdzad pa pos bstan pa nyid kyis bzhed pa mchog yin pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro zhes smras pas /
analyzed: khyad par gyi gzhi'i khyad par ji skad bstan pa la 'gal ba med pa'i phyir dang / mdzad pa pos bstan pa nyid kyis bzhed pa mchog yin pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro zhes smras pas /
translated: because there is no contradiction in the particular of the universal basis as it has been taught, and because the supreme intention is just the teaching of the agent.

original: 'dir rdul phra rab dag pa la sogs pa'i rdzas rtsom par byed pa ma yin par dgag pa yang don dam par dgag go zhes bya bar sbyar ro //üîΩde la don dam par zhes bya ba ni don dam par rdul phra rab dag sa la sogs @97a * //
analyzed: 'dir rdul phra rab dag pa la sogs pa'i rdzas rtsom par byed pa ma yin par dgag pa yang don dam par dgag go zhes bya bar sbyar ro // de la don dam par zhes bya ba ni don dam par rdul phra rab dag sa la sogs @97a * //
translated: Here, the refutation of the composition of substances such as earth from subtle atoms is to be supplied with the words ‚Äúultimately.‚Äù

original: pa'i rdzas rtsom par byed pa rdzas dang dngos po dang gzhi'i sgo nas dgag pa ste /
analyzed: pa'i rdzas rtsom par byed pa rdzas dang dngos po dang gzhi'i sgo nas dgag pa ste /
translated: There, ‚Äúultimately‚Äù means that ultimately the composition of substances such as earth from subtle atoms is refuted in terms of substance, thing, and basis.

original: de yang kun rdzob kyi bden pa la gnas nas don dam pa'i yul la dgag par bya ba yin gyi /
analyzed: de yang kun rdzob kyi bden pa la gnas nas don dam pa'i yul la dgag par bya ba yin gyi /
translated: Moreover, this is to be refuted in the domain of the ultimate while abiding in conventional truth.

original: don dam pa nyid du ni brjod pa med pa'i phyir dgag pa'i tha snyad kyang med do //
analyzed: don dam pa nyid du ni brjod pa med pa'i phyir dgag pa'i tha snyad kyang med do //
translated: But in the ultimate itself, there is no conventional expression of refutation because it is inexpressible.

original: de la sa'i rdul phra rab dag ces bya ba 'di ni chos can yin te /
analyzed: de la sa'i rdul phra rab dag ces bya ba 'di ni chos can yin te /
translated: The phrase the minute particles of earth is the subject.

original: 'di dag la bsgrub par bya ba chos zhes bya ba'i rdzas rtsom par byed pa ma yin te zhes bya ba dang / sgrub pa'i chos rdul phra rab yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba de gnyis yod pa'i phyir chos can zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di dag la bsgrub par bya ba chos zhes bya ba'i rdzas rtsom par byed pa ma yin te zhes bya ba dang / sgrub pa'i chos rdul phra rab yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba de gnyis yod pa'i phyir chos can zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called the subject because it has both the predicate, which is called the property of the thesis, and the reason, which is called the property of the logical reason.

original: sa zhes bya ba'i rdzas rtsom par byed pa ma yin te zhes bya ba 'di ni bsgrub par bya ba chos yin te /
analyzed: sa zhes bya ba'i rdzas rtsom par byed pa ma yin te zhes bya ba 'di ni bsgrub par bya ba chos yin te /
translated: The phrase the substance called earth is the predicate.

original: sa'i rdul phra rab dag sa zhes bya ba'i rdzas rtsom par byed pa'i rgyu ma yin par dam bcas pa yin pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba chos zhes bya'o //
analyzed: sa'i rdul phra rab dag sa zhes bya ba'i rdzas rtsom par byed pa'i rgyu ma yin par dam bcas pa yin pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba chos zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called the predicate because it is the thesis, which is the proposition, The minute particles of earth are not the cause that composes the substance called earth.

original: sa zhes bya ba'i rdzas zhes bya ba ni bye brag pa dag gis yongs su brtags pa'i sa'i rdzas gang las zhes bya ba'i ming yod pa de ni sa zhes bya ba'i rdzas yin no //
analyzed: sa zhes bya ba'i rdzas zhes bya ba ni bye brag pa dag gis yongs su brtags pa'i sa'i rdzas gang las zhes bya ba'i ming yod pa de ni sa zhes bya ba'i rdzas yin no //
translated: The phrase the substance called earth is the substance called earth that is imagined by the Vai≈õe·π£ikas, and it is the substance that has the name earth.

original: rtsom par byed pa ma yin te zhes bya ba ni cha shas sa'i rdul phra rag ces bya ba dag cha shas can gyi rdzas sa zhes bya ba rtsom par byed pa'i rgyu ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: rtsom par byed pa ma yin te zhes bya ba ni cha shas sa'i rdul phra rag ces bya ba dag cha shas can gyi rdzas sa zhes bya ba rtsom par byed pa'i rgyu ma yin pa'o //
translated: It is not the case that the parts, the subtle particles of earth, etc., are the cause of the composition of the whole, the substance called earth.

original: rdul phra rab yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba de ni sgrub pa'i chos yin te /
analyzed: rdul phra rab yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba de ni sgrub pa'i chos yin te /
translated: The reason is: because of being subtle particles.

original: sa'i rdul phra rab khyad par can dag ci'i phyir sa zhes bya ba'i rdzas rtsom par byed pa ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: sa'i rdul phra rab khyad par can dag ci'i phyir sa zhes bya ba'i rdzas rtsom par byed pa ma yin zhe na /
translated: Why is it that the subtle particles of earth, etc., are not the cause of the composition of the substance called earth?

original: rdul phra rab spyi yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: rdul phra rab spyi yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because of being general subtle particles.

original: 'dir yang khyad par can phyogs su byas pa la spyi'i phyogs kyi chos su bstan pas /
analyzed: 'dir yang khyad par can phyogs su byas pa la spyi'i phyogs kyi chos su bstan pas /
translated: Here, the general is the subject, and the property of the subject is stated as the reason.

original: dam bcas pa'i don gyi phyogs gcig gtan tshigs nyid du grub bo //üîΩdper na me'i rdul phra rab dag bzhin no zhes bya ba 'di ni dpe ste /
analyzed: dam bcas pa'i don gyi phyogs gcig gtan tshigs nyid du grub bo // dper na me'i rdul phra rab dag bzhin no zhes bya ba 'di ni dpe ste /
translated: Thus, one part of the meaning of the proposition is established as the reason.üîΩThe example is: just as in the case of the subtle particles of fire.

original: dper na me'i rdul phra rab dag la rdul phra rab dag ces bya ba spyi yod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dper na me'i rdul phra rab dag la rdul phra rab dag ces bya ba spyi yod pa'i phyir /
translated: For example, in the case of the subtle particles of fire, the subtle particles are the subject, and the property of the subject is stated as the reason.

original: me'i rdul phra rab dag sa zhes bya ba'i rdzas rtsom par byed pa ma yin pa bzhin du /üîΩsa'i rdul phra rab dag la yang rdul phra rab ces bya ba'i spyi yod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: me'i rdul phra rab dag sa zhes bya ba'i rdzas rtsom par byed pa ma yin pa bzhin du / sa'i rdul phra rab dag la yang rdul phra rab ces bya ba'i spyi yod pa'i phyir /
translated: Just as the subtle particles of fire do not compose the substance called earth,

original: sa'i rdul phra rab dag kyang sa zhes bya ba'i rdzas rtsom par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sa'i rdul phra rab dag kyang sa zhes bya ba'i rdzas rtsom par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: the subtle particles of earth also do not compose the substance called earth because they possess the generality called subtle particle.

original: 'di skad bstan te /
analyzed: 'di skad bstan te /
translated: This is taught by the following.

original: dper na snyan tshig gi sgra mi rtag ste sgra yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dper na snyan tshig gi sgra mi rtag ste sgra yin pa'i phyir /
translated: For example, the sound of a melodious song is impermanent because it is sound,üîΩlike the sound of a drum.

original: dper na rnga bo che'i sgra bzhin no zhes bya bas snyan tshig dang rnga bo @97b che'i sgra khyad par can phyogs su byas pa la /
analyzed: dper na rnga bo che'i sgra bzhin no zhes bya bas snyan tshig dang rnga bo @97b che'i sgra khyad par can phyogs su byas pa la /
translated: In this example, the sound of a melodious song and the sound of a drum are specified as the subject,üîΩand the property of the subject is indicated by the generality of sound.üîΩAlthough this is only one part of the meaning of the thesis, it is suitable as a reason.

original: sgra spyi'i phyogs kyi chos yin par bstan pas de dam bcas pa'i don gyi phyogs gcig yin yang gtan tshigs su rung ba de bzhin du 'dir yang gzhan gyis yongs su brtags pa'i sa'i rdul phra rab khyad par can dag phyogs su byas pa la /
analyzed: sgra spyi'i phyogs kyi chos yin par bstan pas de dam bcas pa'i don gyi phyogs gcig yin yang gtan tshigs su rung ba de bzhin du 'dir yang gzhan gyis yongs su brtags pa'i sa'i rdul phra rab khyad par can dag phyogs su byas pa la /
translated: In the same way, here, the subtle particles of earth imagined by others are specified as the subject,üîΩand the property of the subject is indicated by the generality of subtle particle.

original: rdul phra rab spyi'i phyogs kyi chos yin par bstan pas /
analyzed: rdul phra rab spyi'i phyogs kyi chos yin par bstan pas /
translated: Since it is taught that the subtle particle is a phenomenon of the general class of earth,

original: de dam bcas pa'i don gyi phyogs gcig yin yang gtan tshigs su rung bar bstan to //
analyzed: de dam bcas pa'i don gyi phyogs gcig yin yang gtan tshigs su rung bar bstan to //
translated: even though it is one part of the meaning of the thesis, it is taught to be suitable as a reason.üîΩSimilarly, it should be stated that the subtle particles of fire are not the substantial cause of the substance fire and so on.

original: de bzhin du me'i rdul phra rab dag kyang me'i rdzas rtsom par byed pa ma yin te zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang brjod par bya'o zhes bya bas ni 'di skad bstan te /
analyzed: de bzhin du me'i rdul phra rab dag kyang me'i rdzas rtsom par byed pa ma yin te zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang brjod par bya'o zhes bya bas ni 'di skad bstan te /
translated: This is taught by the following.

original: ji ltar don dam par sa'i rdul phra rab dag sa zhes bya ba'i rdzas rtsom par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: ji ltar don dam par sa'i rdul phra rab dag sa zhes bya ba'i rdzas rtsom par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: Just as it is taught that ultimately the subtle particles of earth are not the substantial cause of the substance called earth

original: rdul phra rab yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rdul phra rab yin pa'i phyir /
translated: because they are subtle particles,

original: dper na mi'i rdul phra rab dag bzhin no zhes bstan pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: dper na mi'i rdul phra rab dag bzhin no zhes bstan pa de bzhin du /
translated: like the subtle particles of a human,

original: don dam par chu'i rdul phra rab dag kyang chu zhes bya ba'i rdzas rtsom par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: don dam par chu'i rdul phra rab dag kyang chu zhes bya ba'i rdzas rtsom par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: similarly, ultimately the subtle particles of water are not the substantial cause of the substance called water

original: rdul phra rab yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rdul phra rab yin pa'i phyir /
translated: because they are subtle particles,

original: dper na rlung gi rdul phra rab dag bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na rlung gi rdul phra rab dag bzhin no //
translated: like the subtle particles of wind.

original: don dam par me'i rdul phra rab dag kyang me zhes bya ba'i rdzas rtsom par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: don dam par me'i rdul phra rab dag kyang me zhes bya ba'i rdzas rtsom par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: In an ultimate sense, the subtle particles of fire are not the substantial cause of the substance called ‚Äúfire,‚Äù

original: rdul phra rab yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rdul phra rab yin pa'i phyir /
translated: because they are subtle particles.

original: dper na chu'i rdul phra rab dag bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na chu'i rdul phra rab dag bzhin no //
translated: For example, the subtle particles of water.

original: don dam par rlung gi rdul phra rab dag kyang rlung zhes bya ba'i rdzas rtsom par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: don dam par rlung gi rdul phra rab dag kyang rlung zhes bya ba'i rdzas rtsom par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: In an ultimate sense, the subtle particles of wind are not the substantial cause of the substance called ‚Äúwind,‚Äù

original: rdul phra rab yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rdul phra rab yin pa'i phyir /
translated: because they are subtle particles.

original: dper na sa'i rdul phra rab dag bzhin no zhes brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: dper na sa'i rdul phra rab dag bzhin no zhes brjod par bya ste /
translated: For example, the subtle particles of earth.

original: 'di la gang la rdul phra rab nyid mthong ba de la rlung gi rdzas rtsom par byed pa nyid ma mthong ste /
analyzed: 'di la gang la rdul phra rab nyid mthong ba de la rlung gi rdzas rtsom par byed pa nyid ma mthong ste /
translated: Here, one who sees that they are subtle particles does not see that they are the substantial cause of the substance wind.

original: dper na sa'i rdul phra rab dag bzhin no zhes khyad par can phyogs su byas pa la /
analyzed: dper na sa'i rdul phra rab dag bzhin no zhes khyad par can phyogs su byas pa la /
translated: For example, the subtle particles of earth.

original: spyi phyogs kyi chos yin par bstan pas nges par dam bcas pa'i don gyi phyogs gcig yin yang gtan tshigs nyid du rung bas shes par bya'o //
analyzed: spyi phyogs kyi chos yin par bstan pas nges par dam bcas pa'i don gyi phyogs gcig yin yang gtan tshigs nyid du rung bas shes par bya'o //
translated: In this argument, the specific property is stated as the reason, even though it is only part of the meaning of the thesis, because it is known to be the property of the universal subject.

original: de bzhin du phyi rol gyi bum pa dang snam bu dang shing rta dang myu gu la sogs pa rgyu rkyen so sor nges pa las skye ba rnams kyi dgag pa yang ci rigs par khong du chud par bya'o /üîΩ// / bam po bcu gcig pa /
analyzed: de bzhin du phyi rol gyi bum pa dang snam bu dang shing rta dang myu gu la sogs pa rgyu rkyen so sor nges pa las skye ba rnams kyi dgag pa yang ci rigs par khong du chud par bya'o / // / bam po bcu gcig pa /
translated: So too, one should understand that the refutation of external things such as pots, cloth, chariots, and sprouts arising from their own specific causes and conditions is appropriate.

original: gzhan las skye ba spyir dgag pa 'dis gzhan gyi sde pa dag 'ba' zhig gis bkag pa kho nar ma zad kyi /üîΩ'di ltar rang gi sde pa @98a * //
analyzed: gzhan las skye ba spyir dgag pa 'dis gzhan gyi sde pa dag 'ba' zhig gis bkag pa kho nar ma zad kyi / 'di ltar rang gi sde pa @98a * //
translated: This refutation of arising from other in general is not only a refutation by our schools.

original: dag gi yang bkag pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: dag gi yang bkag pa de'i phyir /
translated: It is also a refutation by other Buddhist schools.

original: 'dir chos mngon pa pa dag na re /üîΩgzhan nyid ces bya ba gal te 'bras bu'i nus pas stong pa nyid la bya ba ni gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'dir chos mngon pa pa dag na re / gzhan nyid ces bya ba gal te 'bras bu'i nus pas stong pa nyid la bya ba ni gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, here the Abhidharma masters say:üîΩIf otherness is taken to mean that the effect is empty of the cause‚Äôs potency, then the meaning of the reason is not established.

original: gal te des mi stong pa nyid la bya na ni dpe sgrub pa'i chos dang mi ldan par 'gyur ro zhes zer ro zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: gal te des mi stong pa nyid la bya na ni dpe sgrub pa'i chos dang mi ldan par 'gyur ro zhes zer ro zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: If it is taken to mean that the effect is not empty of the cause, then the example lacks the property being proved.

original: 'dir ni dbu ma pa'i gtan tshigs gzhan nyid ces bya ba dang / dpe bum pa dang rgyu spun la sogs pa bzhin no zhes bya ba de la nyan thos bye brag tu smra ba dag na re /
analyzed: 'dir ni dbu ma pa'i gtan tshigs gzhan nyid ces bya ba dang / dpe bum pa dang rgyu spun la sogs pa bzhin no zhes bya ba de la nyan thos bye brag tu smra ba dag na re /
translated: Here it is shown that the Sravakas, the Vaibhasikas, say that the reason of the Madhyamikas, namely, otherness, and the example, namely, a pot, a cause, a piece of cloth, etc.,

original: gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa dang / dpe sgrub pa'i chos dang mi ldan pa yin no zhes zer ba ston to //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa dang / dpe sgrub pa'i chos dang mi ldan pa yin no zhes zer ba ston to //
translated: are not established and that the example does not have the property to be established.

original: de la chos mngon pa pa dag ces bya ba ni sde pa dag las grub pa'i mtha' chos mngon pa zhes bya ba yod pa de dag ni chos mngon pa pa dag ste /üîΩde dag kyang nyan thos bye brag tu smra ba dag yin no //
analyzed: de la chos mngon pa pa dag ces bya ba ni sde pa dag las grub pa'i mtha' chos mngon pa zhes bya ba yod pa de dag ni chos mngon pa pa dag ste / de dag kyang nyan thos bye brag tu smra ba dag yin no //
translated: The Abhidharmikas, those who have the tenets of the Abhidharma among the schools, are the Sravakas, the Vaibhasikas.

original: na re zhes bya ba ni nyan thos bye brag tu smra ba de dag na re /
analyzed: na re zhes bya ba ni nyan thos bye brag tu smra ba de dag na re /
translated: They say that the reason is not established and that the example does not have the property to be established.

original: dbu ma pa'i gtan tshigs gzhan nyid ces bya ba dang / dpe bum pa dang rgyu spun la sogs pa bzhin no zhes bya ba de la gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa dang / dpe sgrub pa'i chos dang mi ldan pa yin no zhes zer bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: dbu ma pa'i gtan tshigs gzhan nyid ces bya ba dang / dpe bum pa dang rgyu spun la sogs pa bzhin no zhes bya ba de la gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa dang / dpe sgrub pa'i chos dang mi ldan pa yin no zhes zer bar sbyar ro //
translated: The reason ‚Äúbecause they are different‚Äù and the example ‚Äúlike a pot and its cause, a lump of clay‚Äù that the Madhyamaka state are not established as the meaning of the reason and the example do not possess the property to be proven.

original: gzhan nyid ces bya ba ni sngar dbu ma pas don dam par nang gi skye mched rnams de dag gi rkyen gzhan dag las skye ba med de /
analyzed: gzhan nyid ces bya ba ni sngar dbu ma pas don dam par nang gi skye mched rnams de dag gi rkyen gzhan dag las skye ba med de /
translated: ‚Äú Because they are different‚Äù is as follows. Previously the Madhyamaka said, ‚ÄúUltimately the internal sense sources are not produced from their conditions that are different from them.

original: gzhan yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gzhan yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because they are different.

original: dper na bum pa bzhin no zhes bya ba dang / don dam par gzhan brjod par 'dod pa mig la sogs pa nang gi skye mched 'grub par byed pa dag rkyen ma yin par nges te gzhan yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dper na bum pa bzhin no zhes bya ba dang / don dam par gzhan brjod par 'dod pa mig la sogs pa nang gi skye mched 'grub par byed pa dag rkyen ma yin par nges te gzhan yin pa'i phyir /
translated: For example, like a pot.‚Äù And, ‚ÄúUltimately the internal sense sources, such as the eyes, that are asserted to be different are ascertained not to be the conditions that produce them because they are different.

original: dper na rgyu spun la sogs pa bzhin no zhes sbyor ba'i tshig rnam pa gnyis byas pas skye mched rnams rkyen gzhan dag las skye ba med pa dang / rkyen gzhan dag skye mched rnams kyi rkyen ma yin pa'i gtan tshigs su gzhan nyid ces bya ba bstan pa gang yin pa de'o //
analyzed: dper na rgyu spun la sogs pa bzhin no zhes sbyor ba'i tshig rnam pa gnyis byas pas skye mched rnams rkyen gzhan dag las skye ba med pa dang / rkyen gzhan dag skye mched rnams kyi rkyen ma yin pa'i gtan tshigs su gzhan nyid ces bya ba bstan pa gang yin pa de'o //
translated: The reason ‚Äúbecause of being different‚Äù is stated in order to prove that the sense faculties are not produced from other conditions and that other conditions are not the conditions of the sense faculties.

original: nyan thos bye brag tu smra ba de dag rkyen rnams la 'bras bu'i nus pa 'di ltar tshol bar byed de /
analyzed: nyan thos bye brag tu smra ba de dag rkyen rnams la 'bras bu'i nus pa 'di ltar tshol bar byed de /
translated: The ≈õrƒÅvaka VaibhƒÅ·π£ikas search for the potency of the effect in the conditions in the following way.

original: de dag / gcig ni 'phen pa'i las yin te //
analyzed: de dag / gcig ni 'phen pa'i las yin te //
translated: They say: One is the projecting karma.

original: gnyis pa yongs su rdzogs par byed //
analyzed: gnyis pa yongs su rdzogs par byed //
translated: The second is the completing karma.

original: ces zer ro zhes grags pas de'i phyir 'phel ba'i las kyis ni mer mer po'i gnas skabs su mig la sogs pa'i nus @98b pa 'phel bar byed do //
analyzed: ces zer ro zhes grags pas de'i phyir 'phel ba'i las kyis ni mer mer po'i gnas skabs su mig la sogs pa'i nus @98b pa 'phel bar byed do //
translated: Therefore the projecting karma increases the potency of the eye and so on in the state of kalala.

original: yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i las kyis ni mig la sogs pa yongs su rdzogs par byed cing dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur bar byed do //
analyzed: yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i las kyis ni mig la sogs pa yongs su rdzogs par byed cing dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur bar byed do //
translated: The function of fully completing causes is to fully complete the eyes and so on, preventing the faculties from being incomplete.

original: de ltar na skye mched rnams kyi nus pa mer mer po la gnas pa de dag la ltos na mer mer po la sogs pa gzhan nyid yin la /
analyzed: de ltar na skye mched rnams kyi nus pa mer mer po la gnas pa de dag la ltos na mer mer po la sogs pa gzhan nyid yin la /
translated: Thus, in dependence on the embryo, the potency of the sense faculties is different from the embryo and so on.

original: mer mer po la sogs pa la ltos na yang skye mched rnams kyi nus pa gzhan nyid yin pas /
analyzed: mer mer po la sogs pa la ltos na yang skye mched rnams kyi nus pa gzhan nyid yin pas /
translated: In dependence on the embryo and so on, the potency of the sense faculties is also different.

original: de'i phyir de ni 'bras bu'i nus pas mi stong ba'i gzhan nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir de ni 'bras bu'i nus pas mi stong ba'i gzhan nyid ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore this is called ‚Äúdifference that is not empty of the potency of the effect.‚Äù

original: de lta bu ma yin pa skye mched rnams kyi nus pas stong pa dper na bum pa dang rgyu spun la sogs pa la skye mched rnams kyi nus pa med pa lta bu ni skye mched rnams la ltos na bum pa dang rgyu spun la sogs pa gzhanüîΩnyid yin la /
analyzed: de lta bu ma yin pa skye mched rnams kyi nus pas stong pa dper na bum pa dang rgyu spun la sogs pa la skye mched rnams kyi nus pa med pa lta bu ni skye mched rnams la ltos na bum pa dang rgyu spun la sogs pa gzhanüîΩnyid yin la /
translated: That which is not like that, which is empty of the potency of the sense faculties, is, for example, a pot and so on, which are devoid of the potency of the sense faculties. In dependence on the sense faculties, a pot and so on are different.

original: bum pa dang rgyu spun la sogs pa la ltos na yang skye mched rnams gzhan nyid yin pas de'i phyir de ni 'bras bu'i nus pas stong pa'i gzhan nyid ces bya'o zhes zer bas de'i phyir 'dir nyan thos bye brag tu smra ba dag na re /
analyzed: bum pa dang rgyu spun la sogs pa la ltos na yang skye mched rnams gzhan nyid yin pas de'i phyir de ni 'bras bu'i nus pas stong pa'i gzhan nyid ces bya'o zhes zer bas de'i phyir 'dir nyan thos bye brag tu smra ba dag na re /
translated: Therefore, here the Particularists of the ≈õrƒÅvakas posit two alternatives:

original: dbu ma pa'i gtan tshigs gzhan nyid ces bya ba de 'bras bu'i nus pas stong pa'i gzhan nyid la bya'am /
analyzed: dbu ma pa'i gtan tshigs gzhan nyid ces bya ba de 'bras bu'i nus pas stong pa'i gzhan nyid la bya'am /
translated: ‚ÄúDoes the Madhyamaka reason called ‚Äòdifference‚Äô refer to difference that is empty of the potency of the effect?

original: 'on te des mi stong pa'i gzhan nyid la bya zhes gal gnyis rnam par 'jog par byed do zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'on te des mi stong pa'i gzhan nyid la bya zhes gal gnyis rnam par 'jog par byed do zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Or does it refer to difference that is not empty of that?‚Äù

original: gal te 'bras bu'i nus pas stong pa nyid la bya na ni zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gal te 'bras bu'i nus pas stong pa nyid la bya na ni zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If it refers to that which is empty of the potency of the effect,

original: dbu ma pa'i gtan tshigs gzhan nyid ces bya ba de gal te 'bras bu mig la sogs pa'i skye mched rnams kyi nus pas stong pa'i gzhan nyid ces bya ba dper na gzhan bum pa dang rgyu spun la sogs pa lta bu dbu ma pa khyod kyi gtan
analyzed: dbu ma pa'i gtan tshigs gzhan nyid ces bya ba de gal te 'bras bu mig la sogs pa'i skye mched rnams kyi nus pas stong pa'i gzhan nyid ces bya ba dper na gzhan bum pa dang rgyu spun la sogs pa lta bu dbu ma pa khyod kyi gtan
translated: example, the other, the pot, and its cause, the threads, etc., then

original: tshigs nyid du brjod na ni zhes gal 'dzin pa yin no //
analyzed: tshigs nyid du brjod na ni zhes gal 'dzin pa yin no //
translated: the meaning of the reason is not established.

original: 'bras bu'i nus pas stong pa'i gzhan nyid ces bya ba dper na gzhan bum pa dang rgyu spun la sogs pa lta bu gtan tshigs nyid du brjod na ci nyes she na /
analyzed: 'bras bu'i nus pas stong pa'i gzhan nyid ces bya ba dper na gzhan bum pa dang rgyu spun la sogs pa lta bu gtan tshigs nyid du brjod na ci nyes she na /
translated: What is wrong with stating ‚Äúbecause of being other, which is to say, empty of the capacity of the effect,‚Äù like, for example, the other, the pot, and its cause, the threads, etc., as a reason?

original: de'i phyir gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid do zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: de'i phyir gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid do zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: Therefore, it is said that the meaning of the reason is not established.

original: skye mched rnams rkyen 'bras bu'i nus pas stong pa gzhan dag las skye ba med pa dang / rkyen rnams kyang 'bras bu'i nus pas stong pa gzhan dag rkyen ma yin par sgrub pa'i phyogs de nyid la gtan tshigs kyang 'bras bu'i nus pas stong pa gzhan yin pa'i phyir zhes @99a * //
analyzed: skye mched rnams rkyen 'bras bu'i nus pas stong pa gzhan dag las skye ba med pa dang / rkyen rnams kyang 'bras bu'i nus pas stong pa gzhan dag rkyen ma yin par sgrub pa'i phyogs de nyid la gtan tshigs kyang 'bras bu'i nus pas stong pa gzhan yin pa'i phyir zhes @99a * //
translated: The sense sources are not produced from other things that are empty of the potential of the result of conditions, and conditions are not established as not being conditions of other things that are empty of the potential of the result.

original: gtan tshigs khyad par can gzhan brjod na ni gtan tshigs kyi don 'grub pa zhig na /
analyzed: gtan tshigs khyad par can gzhan brjod na ni gtan tshigs kyi don 'grub pa zhig na /
translated: If a specific reason is stated, the meaning of the reason would be established.

original: phyogs de gnyis la gtan tshigs gzhan yin pa'i phyir zhes gzhan spyir brjod pas /
analyzed: phyogs de gnyis la gtan tshigs gzhan yin pa'i phyir zhes gzhan spyir brjod pas /
translated: Since the reason is stated as ‚Äúbecause of being other‚Äù in a general way,

original: 'di ltar des na skye mched rnams rkyen 'bras bu'i nus pas stong pa gzhan dag las skye ba med kyang 'bras bu'i nus pas mi stong pa gzhan dag las skye bar 'gyur ba dang / rkyen rnams kyang 'bras bu'i nus pas stong pa gzhan dag rkyen ma yin yang 'bras bu'i nus pas mi stong ba gzhan dag rkyen yin par 'gyur bas skye ba med pa dang /
analyzed: 'di ltar des na skye mched rnams rkyen 'bras bu'i nus pas stong pa gzhan dag las skye ba med kyang 'bras bu'i nus pas mi stong pa gzhan dag las skye bar 'gyur ba dang / rkyen rnams kyang 'bras bu'i nus pas stong pa gzhan dag rkyen ma yin yang 'bras bu'i nus pas mi stong ba gzhan dag rkyen yin par 'gyur bas skye ba med pa dang /
translated: And although conditions are not conditions of other things that are empty of the potential of the effect, they would be conditions of other things that are not empty of the potential of the effect.

original: rkyen ma yin par sgrub pa'i gtan tshigs kyi don 'khrul pa yod pas ma grub pa nyid de /
analyzed: rkyen ma yin par sgrub pa'i gtan tshigs kyi don 'khrul pa yod pas ma grub pa nyid de /
translated: Therefore, the meaning of the reason proving that they are not conditions is mistaken, and thus it is not established.

original: dper na sgra rtag ste mig gis gzung ba yin pa'i phyir gzugs bzhin no zhes zer ba bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na sgra rtag ste mig gis gzung ba yin pa'i phyir gzugs bzhin no zhes zer ba bzhin no //
translated: For example, it is like saying, ‚ÄúSound is permanent because it is apprehended by the eyes, like a form.‚Äù

original: gal te des mi stong pa nyid la bya na ni zhes bya ba ni dbu ma pa'i gtan tshigs gzhan nyid ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: gal te des mi stong pa nyid la bya na ni zhes bya ba ni dbu ma pa'i gtan tshigs gzhan nyid ces bya ba ste /
translated: If it is said, ‚ÄúIf it is taken to be that which is not empty,‚Äù the reason of the MƒÅdhyamika is ‚Äúbecause of being different.‚Äù

original: gal te 'bras bu mig la sogs pa ste skye mched rnams kyi nus pa des mi stong pa'i gzhan nyid ces bya ba mer mer po la sogs pa lta bu dbu ma pa khyod kyi gtan tshigs su brjod na ni zhes gal 'dzin pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te 'bras bu mig la sogs pa ste skye mched rnams kyi nus pa des mi stong pa'i gzhan nyid ces bya ba mer mer po la sogs pa lta bu dbu ma pa khyod kyi gtan tshigs su brjod na ni zhes gal 'dzin pa yin no //
translated: If you assert that the effect, such as the eye sense faculty, is not empty of the potential of its conditions, and you call that ‚Äúotherness,‚Äù like the oval shaped form of the embryo, and you state that as the reason, then what is the fault?

original: 'bras bu'i nus pas mi stong pa'i gzhan nyid ces bya ba mer mer po la sogs pa lta bu gtan tshigs nyid du brjod na ni ci nyes she na /
analyzed: 'bras bu'i nus pas mi stong pa'i gzhan nyid ces bya ba mer mer po la sogs pa lta bu gtan tshigs nyid du brjod na ni ci nyes she na /
translated: If you state that the effect is not empty of the potential of its conditions, and you call that ‚Äúotherness,‚Äù like the oval shaped form of the embryo, and you state that as the reason, what is the fault?

original: de'i phyir dpe sgrub pa'i chos dang mi ldan par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: de'i phyir dpe sgrub pa'i chos dang mi ldan par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: Therefore it is said that the example lacks the property of the thesis.

original: skye mched rnams rkyen 'bras bu'i nus pas mi stong pa gzhan dag las skye ba med pa dang / rkyen rnams kyang 'bras bu'i nus pas mi stong pas gzhan dag rkyen ma yin par sgrub pa'i phyogs de gnyis la /
analyzed: skye mched rnams rkyen 'bras bu'i nus pas mi stong pa gzhan dag las skye ba med pa dang / rkyen rnams kyang 'bras bu'i nus pas mi stong pas gzhan dag rkyen ma yin par sgrub pa'i phyogs de gnyis la /
translated: The thesis is that the sense faculties are not produced from other conditions that are not empty of the potential of the effect, and the conditions are not established as not being the conditions of the effect because they are not empty of the potential of the effect.

original: dper yang 'bras bu'i nus pas mi stong pa sgrub pa'i chos gzhan nyid dang ldan pa las blangs na ni dpe sgrub pa'i chos dang ldan par 'gyur ba zhig na phyogs de gnyis la dpe bum pa dang rgyu spun la sogs pa bzhin no zhes 'bras bu mig
analyzed: dper yang 'bras bu'i nus pas mi stong pa sgrub pa'i chos gzhan nyid dang ldan pa las blangs na ni dpe sgrub pa'i chos dang ldan par 'gyur ba zhig na phyogs de gnyis la dpe bum pa dang rgyu spun la sogs pa bzhin no zhes 'bras bu mig
translated: If the example is taken to be something that is not empty of the potential for the effect, and that possesses a property that is established as being different from it, then the example would possess a property that is established as being different from the position.üîΩHowever, the example is taken to be a pot and its cause, the threads, and so on, in the statement, ‚ÄúThe two positions are like the example, the pot and its cause, the threads, and so on.‚ÄùüîΩThe pot and its cause, the threads, and so on, are taken as examples of something that is empty of the potential for the effect, the eyes, and so on.

original: la sogs pa'i skye mched rnams kyi nus pas stong pa'i bum pa dang rgyu spun la sogs pa las blangs pa 'di ltar des na 'bras bu skye mched nus pas mi stong pa gzhan nyid rkyen mer mer po la sogs pa gzhan las skye ba med pa'i dpe
analyzed: la sogs pa'i skye mched rnams kyi nus pas stong pa'i bum pa dang rgyu spun la sogs pa las blangs pa 'di ltar des na 'bras bu skye mched nus pas mi stong pa gzhan nyid rkyen mer mer po la sogs pa gzhan las skye ba med pa'i dpe
translated: Therefore, the example is not of an effect that is not empty of the potential for the effect arising from another, such as a condition that is a fully developed fetus.

original: bum pa 'bras bu'i nus pas stong pa gzhan nyid ces bya ba de yang @99b sgrub pa'i chos 'bras bu'i skye mched nus pas mi stong pa de dang mi ldan pa dang / rkyen mer mer po la sogs pa 'bras bu'i nus pas mi stong ba gzhan nyid rkyen ma yin pa'i dpe rgyu spun la sogs pa 'bras bu'i nus pas stong pa gzhan nyid ces bya ba de yang sgrub pa'i chos mer mer po la sogs pa 'bras bu'i nusüîΩpas mi stong pa gzhan nyid ces bya ba de dang mi ldan par 'gyur bas /
analyzed: bum pa 'bras bu'i nus pas stong pa gzhan nyid ces bya ba de yang @99b sgrub pa'i chos 'bras bu'i skye mched nus pas mi stong pa de dang mi ldan pa dang / rkyen mer mer po la sogs pa 'bras bu'i nus pas mi stong ba gzhan nyid rkyen ma yin pa'i dpe rgyu spun la sogs pa 'bras bu'i nus pas stong pa gzhan nyid ces bya ba de yang sgrub pa'i chos mer mer po la sogs pa 'bras bu'i nus pas mi stong pa gzhan nyid ces bya ba de dang mi ldan par 'gyur bas /
translated: Also, the other called ‚Äúthe empty condition such as the sprout is empty of the capacity for effect‚Äù is not endowed with the phenomenon to be established, the empty condition such as the sprout.

original: dpe dang gtan tshigs mi mthun pas dpe sgrub pa'i chos dang mi ldan par 'gyur te /
analyzed: dpe dang gtan tshigs mi mthun pas dpe sgrub pa'i chos dang mi ldan par 'gyur te /
translated: Since the example and reason are not similar, the example is not endowed with the phenomenon to be established.

original: dper na sgra rtag ste lus med pa'i phyir dper na rdul phra rab bzhin no zhes zer ba bzhin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dper na sgra rtag ste lus med pa'i phyir dper na rdul phra rab bzhin no zhes zer ba bzhin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: For example, it is like saying, ‚ÄúSound is permanent because it is without body, like a subtle particle.‚Äù

original: nyan thos bya brag tu smra ba de skad ces zer ba yin no //
analyzed: nyan thos bya brag tu smra ba de skad ces zer ba yin no //
translated: This is what the VaibhƒÅ·π£ika ≈õrƒÅvakas say.

original: de skad ces zer ba'i lan du /
analyzed: de skad ces zer ba'i lan du /
translated: In response to that,

original: 'dir 'grel pa byed pas gzhi gzhan la ltos pa gzhan nyid kyi blo skyed pa spyi'i chos spyir brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'dir 'grel pa byed pas gzhi gzhan la ltos pa gzhan nyid kyi blo skyed pa spyi'i chos spyir brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: the author of the commentary says that the reason why the VaibhƒÅ·π£ika‚Äôs reductio is not established is because in general, the mind that conceives difference in dependence on other things is a general statement.

original: ltag chod de ni ma grub pa ltar snang ba dang / sgrub pa dang mi ldan pa ltar snang ba yin no zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: ltag chod de ni ma grub pa ltar snang ba dang / sgrub pa dang mi ldan pa ltar snang ba yin no zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: He says that the reductio is like something that is not established appearing to be not established and like something that is not a proof appearing to be not a proof.

original: 'dis ni dbu ma pas gtan tshigs gzhan nyid ces bya ba de 'bras bu'i nus pas stong pa'i gzhan nyid dam des mi stong pa'i gzhan nyid la bya'o zhes bye brag tu ma phye bar spyir brjod pa'i phyir bye brag tu smra ba'i ltag chod gtan tshigs kyi
analyzed: 'dis ni dbu ma pas gtan tshigs gzhan nyid ces bya ba de 'bras bu'i nus pas stong pa'i gzhan nyid dam des mi stong pa'i gzhan nyid la bya'o zhes bye brag tu ma phye bar spyir brjod pa'i phyir bye brag tu smra ba'i ltag chod gtan tshigs kyi
translated: This is because the Madhyamika does not distinguish between the reason called difference as referring to difference that is empty of the capacity for effect or difference that is not empty of that but makes a general statement.

original: don ma grub pa nyid do zhes zer ba de yang gsal ba dang de kho na ma yin te /
analyzed: don ma grub pa nyid do zhes zer ba de yang gsal ba dang de kho na ma yin te /
translated: Therefore the VaibhƒÅ·π£ika‚Äôs reductio is not clear and is not correct.

original: ma grub pa ltar snang ba yin la /
analyzed: ma grub pa ltar snang ba yin la /
translated: It is like something that is not established appearing to be not established.

original: dpe sgrub pa'i chos dang mi ldan par 'gyur ro zhes zer ba de yang gsal ba dang de kho na ma yin te /
analyzed: dpe sgrub pa'i chos dang mi ldan par 'gyur ro zhes zer ba de yang gsal ba dang de kho na ma yin te /
translated: The response to that is: ‚ÄúThe example would not possess the property of the probandum.‚Äù

original: sgrub pa dang mi ldan pa ltar snang ba yin no zhes ston to //
analyzed: sgrub pa dang mi ldan pa ltar snang ba yin no zhes ston to //
translated: This is stated to show that the example is not that which is not the same as the probandum, but it is a mere semblance of not possessing the probandum.

original: de la gzhi gzhan la ltos pa gzhan nyid kyi blo skyed pa spyi'i chos spyir brjod pa'i phyir zhes bya bas ni 'di skad bstan te /
analyzed: de la gzhi gzhan la ltos pa gzhan nyid kyi blo skyed pa spyi'i chos spyir brjod pa'i phyir zhes bya bas ni 'di skad bstan te /
translated: With respect to that, the statement ‚Äúbecause the general property of the cognition of difference that depends on other bases is stated generally‚Äù indicates the following.

original: kho bo'i gtan tshigs gzhan nyid ces bya ba de ni 'bras bu'i nus pas stong pa'i gzhan nyid dam des mi stong pa'i gzhan nyid la bya'o zhes bye brag tu ma phye bar gzhan nyid ces bya ba spyir brjod pa'i phyir nyes pa de gnyi ga med do
analyzed: kho bo'i gtan tshigs gzhan nyid ces bya ba de ni 'bras bu'i nus pas stong pa'i gzhan nyid dam des mi stong pa'i gzhan nyid la bya'o zhes bye brag tu ma phye bar gzhan nyid ces bya ba spyir brjod pa'i phyir nyes pa de gnyi ga med do
translated: The reason called ‚Äúdifference‚Äù is not specified as either the difference that is empty of the capacity of the effect or the difference that is not empty of that. Because the general term ‚Äúdifference‚Äù is stated, neither of those two errors exists.

original: zhes ston to //
analyzed: zhes ston to //
translated: This is stated to show that.

original: de la gzhi zhes bya ba ni 'di la byas pa nyid dang skye ba dang ldan pa nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa chos du ma dag la gnas par bzhi ste /
analyzed: de la gzhi zhes bya ba ni 'di la byas pa nyid dang skye ba dang ldan pa nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa chos du ma dag la gnas par bzhi ste /
translated: With respect to that, the basis is the locus of many properties, such as being a product and being a product of karma.

original: de yang 'di la ste /
analyzed: de yang 'di la ste /
translated: That is stated here.

original: skye mched rnams dang / rkyen rnams dang / bum pa dang / rgyu spun la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: skye mched rnams dang / rkyen rnams dang / bum pa dang / rgyu spun la sogs pa'o //
translated: the sense bases, conditions, pot, thread, and so on.

original: @100a * // gzhi de nyid gzhan la ltos pa yin te /
analyzed: @100a * // gzhi de nyid gzhan la ltos pa yin te /
translated: That very basis is dependent on another basis.

original: 'di ltar gzhi las gzhan pa'i gzhi gang yin pa de ni gzhi gzhan yin la /
analyzed: 'di ltar gzhi las gzhan pa'i gzhi gang yin pa de ni gzhi gzhan yin la /
translated: In that case, that which is a basis other than a basis is another basis.

original: gzhi gzhan de la ltos pa'i gzhi gang yin pa de ni gzhi gzhan la ltos pa yin pas gzhi gzhan la ltos pa ste /
analyzed: gzhi gzhan de la ltos pa'i gzhi gang yin pa de ni gzhi gzhan la ltos pa yin pas gzhi gzhan la ltos pa ste /
translated: That which is a basis dependent on another basis is dependent on another basis.

original: de yang 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de yang 'di lta ste /
translated: That is also like this:

original: skye mched rnams dang / rkyen rnams dang / bum pa dang / rgyu spun la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: skye mched rnams dang / rkyen rnams dang / bum pa dang / rgyu spun la sogs pa'o //
translated: the sense bases, conditions, pot, thread, and so on.

original: gzhi gzhan la ltos pa de nyid gzhan nyid kyi blo skyed pa yin te /üîΩ'di ltar skye mched rnams kyang rkyen rnams dang bum pa dang rgyu spun la sogs pa las gzhan nyid yin la /
analyzed: gzhi gzhan la ltos pa de nyid gzhan nyid kyi blo skyed pa yin te / 'di ltar skye mched rnams kyang rkyen rnams dang bum pa dang rgyu spun la sogs pa las gzhan nyid yin la /
translated: That very dependent on another basis generates the cognition of otherness.üîΩIn that case, the sense bases are other than the conditions, pot, thread, and so on.

original: rkyen rnams kyang skye mched rnams dang bum pa dang rgyu spun la sogs pa las gzhan nyid yin /
analyzed: rkyen rnams kyang skye mched rnams dang bum pa dang rgyu spun la sogs pa las gzhan nyid yin /
translated: The conditions are other than the sense bases, pot, thread, and so on.

original: bum pa yang skye mched rnams dang / rkyen rnams dang / rgyu spun la sogs pa las gzhan nyid yin /
analyzed: bum pa yang skye mched rnams dang / rkyen rnams dang / rgyu spun la sogs pa las gzhan nyid yin /
translated: Also, the pot is different from the sense bases, conditions, and the causal components such as clay.

original: rgyu spun la sogs pa yang skye mched rnams dang / rkyen rnams dang bum pa las gzhan nyid yin pas de gzhan nyid kyang yin la /
analyzed: rgyu spun la sogs pa yang skye mched rnams dang / rkyen rnams dang bum pa las gzhan nyid yin pas de gzhan nyid kyang yin la /
translated: The causal components such as clay are also different from the sense bases, conditions, and the pot.

original: de la 'jig rten na gzhan nyid kyi blo skyed par byed pa yang yin pas /
analyzed: de la 'jig rten na gzhan nyid kyi blo skyed par byed pa yang yin pas /
translated: Therefore, they are different, and the mind that conceives of their difference is generated in the world.

original: de'i phyir gzhan nyid kyi blo skyed pa ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir gzhan nyid kyi blo skyed pa ste /
translated: Therefore, the mind that conceives of their difference is generated.

original: de yang 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de yang 'di lta ste /
translated: Moreover, it is like this:

original: skye mched rnams dang / rkyen rnams dang / bum pa dang / rgyu spun la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: skye mched rnams dang / rkyen rnams dang / bum pa dang / rgyu spun la sogs pa'o //
translated: The sense bases, conditions, pot, and causal components such as clay.

original: gzhi gzhan la ltos pa gzhan nyid kyi blo skyed pa de nyid spyi yin te /
analyzed: gzhi gzhan la ltos pa gzhan nyid kyi blo skyed pa de nyid spyi yin te /
translated: The mind that conceives of difference that depends on other bases is a universal characteristic.

original: 'di ltar gzhan nyid ces bya ba gang yin pa ste spyi la yod pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: 'di ltar gzhan nyid ces bya ba gang yin pa ste spyi la yod pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because that which is called ‚Äúdifference‚Äù exists in a universal.

original: de yang 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de yang 'di lta ste /
translated: Moreover, it is like this:

original: skye mched rnams dang / rkyen rnams dang / bum pa dang / rgyu spun la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: skye mched rnams dang / rkyen rnams dang / bum pa dang / rgyu spun la sogs pa'o //
translated: The sense bases, conditions, pot, and causal components such as clay.

original: gzhi gzhan la ltos pa gzhan nyid kyi blo skyed pa spyi de'i chos zhes bya ba ni gzhan nyid ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: gzhi gzhan la ltos pa gzhan nyid kyi blo skyed pa spyi de'i chos zhes bya ba ni gzhan nyid ces bya ba ste /
translated: The general property called ‚Äúotherness‚Äù is the production of the cognition of otherness in dependence on another basis.

original: skye mched rnams dang / rkyen rnams dang / bum pa dang / rgyu spun la sogs pa spyi'i chos gzhan nyid ces bya ba kho bo'i gtan tshigs su brjod pa gang yin pa'o //üîΩspyir brjod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni kho bo'i gtan tshigs gzhan nyid ces bya ba spyi'i chos de kho bos 'bras bu'i nus pas stong pa'i gzhan nyid do zhe'am /
analyzed: skye mched rnams dang / rkyen rnams dang / bum pa dang / rgyu spun la sogs pa spyi'i chos gzhan nyid ces bya ba kho bo'i gtan tshigs su brjod pa gang yin pa'o // spyir brjod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni kho bo'i gtan tshigs gzhan nyid ces bya ba spyi'i chos de kho bos 'bras bu'i nus pas stong pa'i gzhan nyid do zhe'am /
translated: The general property called ‚Äúotherness‚Äù is the bases of the sense faculties, the conditions, the pot, the threads that are the cause, and so on.üîΩThe expression ‚Äúbecause it is expressed generally‚Äù means that the general property called ‚Äúotherness‚Äù is the reason that I have stated.

original: des mi stong pa'i gzhan nyid do zhes bye brag tu ma phye bar gzhan nyid ces spyir gtan tshigs su brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des mi stong pa'i gzhan nyid do zhes bye brag tu ma phye bar gzhan nyid ces spyir gtan tshigs su brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: I have not distinguished it as ‚Äúotherness that is empty of the capacity for the effect‚Äù or ‚Äúotherness that is not empty of that.‚ÄùüîΩI have stated the general reason ‚Äúotherness‚Äù without making such distinctions.

original: de ltar kho bo'i gtan tshigs gzhan nyid ces bya ba de spyir brjod pa @100b de'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar kho bo'i gtan tshigs gzhan nyid ces bya ba de spyir brjod pa @100b de'i phyir /
translated: Because I have stated the reason ‚Äúotherness‚Äù in that way, in a general manner,

original: khyod kyi ltag chod de ni ma grub pa ltar snang ba dang / sgrub pa dang mi ldan pa snang ba yin no zhes mjug bsdu bar bya'o //
analyzed: khyod kyi ltag chod de ni ma grub pa ltar snang ba dang / sgrub pa dang mi ldan pa snang ba yin no zhes mjug bsdu bar bya'o //
translated: You should conclude that your reductio argument is not established and appears to be nonexistent and is not established.

original: de la ltag chod de ni zhes bya ba ni log thabs su smra ba de ste /
analyzed: de la ltag chod de ni zhes bya ba ni log thabs su smra ba de ste /
translated: With respect to that, ‚Äúthat reductio argument‚Äù refers to the argument that is a deceptive method.

original: sngar chos mngon pa dag na re /
analyzed: sngar chos mngon pa dag na re /
translated: Previously, the Abhidharma people said:

original: gzhan nyid ces bya ba gal te 'bras bu'i nus pas stong pa nyid la bya na ni gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid do //
analyzed: gzhan nyid ces bya ba gal te 'bras bu'i nus pas stong pa nyid la bya na ni gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid do //
translated: If ‚Äúdifference‚Äù means that the effect is empty of the cause, then the meaning of your reason is not established.

original: gal te des mi stong pa nyid la bya na ni dpe sgrub pa'i chos dang mi ldan par 'gyur ro zhes zer ba de'o //
analyzed: gal te des mi stong pa nyid la bya na ni dpe sgrub pa'i chos dang mi ldan par 'gyur ro zhes zer ba de'o //
translated: If it means that the effect is not empty of the cause, then your example would not have the property of the thesis.

original: ma grub pa ltar snang ba zhes bya ba ni khyod la kho bo'i gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid kyi gsal ba dang de kho na med pas ma grub pa ltar snang ba yin gyi /
analyzed: ma grub pa ltar snang ba zhes bya ba ni khyod la kho bo'i gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid kyi gsal ba dang de kho na med pas ma grub pa ltar snang ba yin gyi /
translated: ‚Äú Appears to be nonexistent‚Äù means that for you, the meaning of my reason is not established because the manifestation and that which is manifested do not exist.

original: ma grub pa nyid ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: ma grub pa nyid ma yin pa ste /
translated: It is not that it is not established.

original: kho bos gtan tshigs gzhan nyid ces bya ba de 'bras bu'i nus pa stong pa'i gzhan nyid la bya'o zhes bye brag tu mi brjid pas kho bo'i gtan tshigs kyi don gzhan nyid ces bya ba de grub pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro /
analyzed: kho bos gtan tshigs gzhan nyid ces bya ba de 'bras bu'i nus pa stong pa'i gzhan nyid la bya'o zhes bye brag tu mi brjid pas kho bo'i gtan tshigs kyi don gzhan nyid ces bya ba de grub pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro /
translated: We do not specify that the meaning of the reason ‚Äúotherness‚Äù is ‚Äúotherness that is empty of the potency of the effect,‚Äù and therefore the meaning of our reason ‚Äúotherness‚Äù is established.

original: sgrub pa dang mi ldan pa ltar snang ba yin no zhes bya ba ni khyod la kho bo'i dpe sgrub pa'i chos dang mi ldan pa'i gsal ba dang de kho na med pas sgrub pa dang mi ldan pa ltar snang ba yin gyi /
analyzed: sgrub pa dang mi ldan pa ltar snang ba yin no zhes bya ba ni khyod la kho bo'i dpe sgrub pa'i chos dang mi ldan pa'i gsal ba dang de kho na med pas sgrub pa dang mi ldan pa ltar snang ba yin gyi /
translated: The response ‚ÄúYou have a nonestablished example‚Äù is as follows: For you, the example that we use is a nonestablished example because the instance of the reason and the property to be proven do not exist.

original: sgrub pa dang mi ldan pa nyid ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: sgrub pa dang mi ldan pa nyid ma yin pa ste /
translated: However, it is not the case that the reason is not established.

original: kho bos gtan tshigs gzhan nyid ces bya ba de 'bras bu'i nus pas mi stong pa'i gzhan nyid la bya'o zhes bye brag tu ma brjod pas /
analyzed: kho bos gtan tshigs gzhan nyid ces bya ba de 'bras bu'i nus pas mi stong pa'i gzhan nyid la bya'o zhes bye brag tu ma brjod pas /
translated: We do not specify that the meaning of the reason ‚Äúotherness‚Äù is ‚Äúotherness that is not empty of the potency of the effect.‚Äù

original: kho bo'i dpe bum pa dang rgyu spun la sogs pa sgrub pa'i chos gzhan nyid ces bya ba dang ldan pa kho na yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: kho bo'i dpe bum pa dang rgyu spun la sogs pa sgrub pa'i chos gzhan nyid ces bya ba dang ldan pa kho na yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the example, the pot, and the cause, the lump of clay, and so on, are only endowed with the property of otherness.

original: gzhan dag na re /
analyzed: gzhan dag na re /
translated: Others say:

original: don dam pa phyi dang nang gi skye mched rnams khas ma blangs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: don dam pa phyi dang nang gi skye mched rnams khas ma blangs pa'i phyir /
